schema.name: Taragon Tuna
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp, ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the fresh tuna by patting it dry with paper towels to remove any excess moisture.
Season the tuna evenly with 1 tsp of dried tarragon, 0.25 tsp of salt, and 1 tsp of ground black pepper.
Preheat a skillet over medium-high heat.
Place the seasoned tuna in the skillet and sear each side for 2-3 minutes for medium-rare, or adjust the cooking time to your preferred level of doneness.
Remove the tuna from the skillet and let it rest for a couple of minutes before slicing.

schema.description: This Taragon Tuna recipe is perfect for those following a healthy lifestyle and seeking low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar meal options. Its blend of dried tarragon with fresh tuna is not only healthy but deliciously satisfying, making it a great choice for health-conscious individuals who don't want to compromise on flavor.
